scripts.test: npm run lint && NODE_PATH=./lib NODE_ENV=test mocha --recursive test/
scripts.init: npm run init-db && npm run migrate
scripts.test-integration: npm run lint && NODE_PATH=./lib NODE_ENV=test-integration mocha --recursive test/
scripts.init-db: createuser -s -d big-poppa; createdb big-poppa; createdb big-poppa-test
scripts.migrate: npm run migrate-dev && npm run migrate-test
scripts.rollback: npm run rollback-dev && npm run rollback-test
scripts.test-common: npm run lint && NODE_PATH=./lib NODE_ENV=test mocha --recursive test/common/
scripts.init-start-hooray-worker: npm run migrate && NODE_PATH=./lib node lib/hooray/workers
